CustomField.formula: (IF( Solo_Traveller__c , (QTY_Number__c * sub_stopover__r.Price_Solo__c) , (QTY_Number__c * sub_stopover__r.Price__c))) + (IF( Solo_Traveller__c , (QTY_Number__c * Post_Tour_StopOver__r.Price_Solo__c ) , (QTY_Number__c * Post_Tour_StopOver__r.Price__c )))
CustomField.label: Stopover cost
